mapper.select: SELECT boardNum, boardTitle, boardContent, boardAuthor, boardDate, boardLike FROM boards
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards (boardNum, boardTitle, boardContent, boardAuthor, boardLike) VALUES (#{boardNum}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent},#{boardAuthor}, 1)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM boards WHERE boardNum, boardTitle, boardContent, boardAuthor, boardDate, boardLike = (#{boardNum}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent},#{boardAuthor}, #{boardDate},#{boardLike})
